CatDescriptText: Mr. Levi Sanders, 409 Robinson Court, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 7, 1958, pg. 3 with question: �Do you think adults in the community are doing enough to foster constructive recreational activities, like playgrounds, centers, places to dance, Little Leagues, etc., for youth?� answer reads: �No, not enough. In our neighborhood one recreation center closed for some unknown cause and we have one playground where there should be two.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Levi Sanders, wearing hat with diagonally patterned stripes, eyeglasses, and jacket with lapel pin, standing in front of block wall
